definition: variant of 訂貨|订货[ding4 huo4]
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: The development of the game has taken two years but advanced orders are impressive.
sentences.chinese: 开发制作该游戏软件长达两年，但预定货量十分喜人。

sentences.english: Orders are taken by mail, and the goods are sent out from a central point where they are stored.
sentences.chinese: 定货单是邮寄来的，货物是从贮存中心发出去的。

sentences.english: KN :Well, you've seen the order quantities. What do you think you could manage?
sentences.chinese: 你已看到了定货量，你认为你能应付什么情况？

sentences.english: I hope so. If I order now , when deliver?
sentences.chinese: 希望如此，如果现在定货，什么时候交货。

sentences.english: He said it didn't pay to run such a big plant for a few orders.
sentences.chinese: 他说，为了少量的定货办这么大的工厂不上算。

sentences.english: The letter of credit for each order shall reach Party A45 days before the date of shipment .
sentences.chinese: 每笔定货的信用证将在装运前45天送交甲方。

sentences.english: We keep a reference sample of such special orders.
sentences.chinese: 我方保存着这种特殊定货的一份样品。

sentences.english: Could you please let us know what discount you can give for an order exceeding 400 sets?
sentences.chinese: 能否告知定货超过400台你方所能给的折扣。

sentences.english: This encourages visitor traffic and promotes client reorders .
sentences.chinese: 这些鼓励了交易访问者并促进了客户再次定货。

sentences.english: If you order in large quantity I think a discount would be possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果定货量较大的话，我公司可以适当让利。

sentences.english: He sent an order for groceries.
sentences.chinese: 他送了一个食品杂货的定货单。

sentences.english: Decisions to reorder or return goods to suppliers can then be made. (NETEM 1994, Passage 2, Paragraph 2)
sentences.chinese: 然后做出决定是再定货还是把商品退给供应商。

sentences.english: The Acme order?I mailed it out this morning.
sentences.chinese: 艾克明的定货吗？我今天早上寄出去了。

sentences.english: If the goods are favorably accepted by our customers you can expect further orders from us.
sentences.chinese: 如我方客户对你方货物反映良好，会再向你们定货的。

sentences.english: Could you please let us know what discount you can give for an order exceeding 00 sets?
sentences.chinese: 能否告知定货超过00台你方所能给的折扣。

definition: to order goods/to place an order
variant of 訂單|订单[ding4 dan1]
to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to order goods/to place an order
to put together an order of goods
delivery time (time between ordering goods and receiving the delivery)/date of delivery
